I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
B: A -> cpo
s: chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))
x: Poset.sort (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))

Goal:
(forall y : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x), y \In s -> y <== x) -> dfun_lim s <== x

Premises:
Notation Poset T m := (Poset.pack id)
dfun_lim = fun (s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (x : A) => lim (dapp_chain s x) : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)) -> dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)
dfunPoset : forall A : Type, (A -> poset) -> poset
CPO.sort = fun t : cpo => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : cpo -> Type CPO.sort is a coercion
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
Record chain (T : poset) : Type := Chain { pred_of : Pred T; _ : chain_axiom pred_of } Arguments Chain [T pred_of]
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [A : Type B : A -> cpo s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)) x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x) |- Type] ?T' : [A : Type B : A -> cpo s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)) x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x) |- Type] ?f : [A : Type B : A ->...-> cpo s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)) x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x) |- seq ?T]
dfun_limP : forall (s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), x \In s -> x <== dfun_lim s
dfun_supM : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> lattice) (s : Pred (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (p : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), (forall q : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x), q \In s -> q <== p) -> dfun_sup s <== p
dapp_mono : forall x0 : ?A, monotone (@^~ x0) where ?A : [A : Type B : A -> cpo s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)) x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x) |- Type] ?T : [A : Type B : A -> cpo s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)) x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x) |- ?A -> poset]
app_mono : forall x0 : ?A, monotone (@^~ x0) where ?A : [A : Type B : A -> cpo s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)) x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x) |- Type] ?T : [A : Type B : A -> cpo s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)) x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x) |- poset]
dfun_sup : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> lattice), Pred (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)) -> dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)
dfun_supP : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> lattice) (s : Pred (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (p : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), p \In s -> p <== dfun_sup s
dfunLatticeMixin : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> lattice), Lattice.mixin_of (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))
dfun_botP : forall x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x), dfun_bot <== x
dfun_bot = fun x : A => bot : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)
CPOMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_bot : T) (mx_lim : chain T -> T), (forall x : T, mx_bot <== x) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x) -> CPO.mixin_of T
pair_limM : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), (forall y : [posetofA * B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> pair_lim s <== x
limM : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), (forall y : D, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lim s <== x
fun_limM : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), (forall y : [posetofA -> B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> fun_lim s <== x
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_bot : Poset.sort T; mx_lim : chain T -> T; _ : forall x : T, mx_bot <== x; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x } Arguments CPO.Mixin [T mx_bot] [mx_lim]%function_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope

dfun_leq : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> poset), (forall x : A, B x) -> (forall x : A, B x) -> Prop
pair_asym : forall (A B : poset) (x y : A * B), pair_leq x y -> pair_leq y x -> x = y
proj2_mono = fun (T1 T2 : poset) (_top_assumption_ : pairPoset T1 T2) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : T1) (b : T2), (fun p : T1 * T2 => forall y : pairPoset T1 T2, p <== y -> p.2 <== y.2) (a, b) => let (x, x0) as p return ((fun p0 : T1 * T2 => forall y : pairPoset T1 T2, p0 <== y -> p0.2 <== y.2) p) := _top_assumption_ in _evar_0_ x x0) (fun (x1 : T1) (x2 : T2) (__top_assumption_ : pairPoset T1 T2) => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (a : T1) (b : T2), (fun p : T1 *...
dfun_trans : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> poset) (x : forall x : A, B x) (y z : forall x0 : A, B x0), dfun_leq x y -> dfun_leq y z -> dfun_leq x z
subp_andr : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> (fun x : T => q x /\ p1 x) <=p (fun x : T => q x /\ p2 x)
subp_andl : forall (T : Type) (p1 p2 q : Pred T), p1 <=p p2 -> (fun x : T => p1 x /\ q x) <=p (fun x : T => p2 x /\ q x)
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
dapp_chain : forall (A : Type) (T : A -> poset), chain (dfunPoset T) -> forall x : A, chain (T x)
pair_supM : forall (A B : lattice) (s : Pred (A * B)) (p : A * B), (forall q : A * B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> pair_sup s <== p
